title: Implement Yield Logic and API
description:
1. Create `src/services/yield.service.ts`.
   - Method `processYields(userId)`: Find yielding accounts, calc diff days since `lastYieldDate`, apply CDI formula, create INCOME transactions, update `lastYieldDate`.
   - Formula: `Balance * ((1 + 0.1125)^(1/252) - 1) * (percentage/100) * (1 - 0.2715)`.
2. Create `src/app/api/accounts/yield/route.ts` to trigger this service via POST.
